Updated November     pm



The East Carolina baseball team announced its official schedule for the upcoming  season Monday which opens Feb PERIOD  at home against Longwood PERIOD

The schedule includes  home games for the Pirates with  of the hostedcontests coming during the first  games of the year including the thirteenth Annual Keith LeClair Classic PERIOD Southeastern Louisiana Tennessee and Maryland are the three teams that will be traveling to Greenville for the Keith LeClair classic March  PERIOD Maryland stands out of the bunch as the only team to participate in a Super Regional last season PERIOD

The Pirates have put an emphasis on nonconference scheduling as well PERIOD A renewal with former rival and Conference USA member Rice means that the Pirates will travel to Texas for a threegame set with the Owls March  PERIOD

Leaving the friendly confines of ClarkLeClair Stadium the Pirates will embark on their first road series against perennial power and  College World Series champions Virginia.The threegame set Feb PERIOD  is just the latest in the homeandhome agreement that the teams started in  PERIOD The Pirates were swept in the seasonopening series at home against the Cavaliers last season PERIOD

The tough slate of nonconference matchups doesnt end there however PERIOD Homeandhomes with instate foes North Carolina March  and May  and North Carolina State April  and April  loom large as well as a road game against Duke March  PERIOD Head coach Cliff Godwin has always taken pride in not only scheduling tough opponents but also in beating the instate rivals PERIOD

We are very excited about our  schedule Godwin said PERIOD We wanted to challenge ourselves in our nonconference schedule to prepare us for the rigorous American Athletic Conference Schedule which had the thirdbest RPI in the country last year PERIOD Our season will be challenging but we are eager to play some of the best teams in the country. houston April  Tulane April  Memphis April  Connecticut April  and May  Cincinnati April 29May  South Florida May  and Central Florida May  stand as the conference teams that the Pirates will play in the upcoming campaign PERIOD

Conference play for the Diamond Bucs opens April  with a threegame set with American Athletic Conference rival Houston in Greenville PERIOD  of the next  games mark conference contests and for the second consecutive season ECU will wrap up the season on the road against the Central Florida Knights PERIOD

The AAC tournament gets underway May  in Clearwater Florida PERIOD
